title: Background on reception for Justice Sonia Sotomayor | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




August 12, 2009

 



Background on reception for Justice Sonia Sotomayor




 THE WHITE HOUSE Office of the Press Secretary  ___________________________________________________________________________  For Immediate Release                                                       August 12, 2009 BACKGROUND ON RECEPTION FOR JUSTICE SONIA SOTOMAYOR EAST ROOM  10:15AM EDT President Obama will deliver remarks at a reception honoring Justice Sonia Sotomayor. The President will make brief remarks and introduce Justice Sotomayor, who will also deliver remarks. The audience will be comprised of members of Justice Sotomayor’s family and friends, leaders of the Hispanic community, members of Congress, Supreme Court justices, judges from the federal Courts of Appeals, members of law enforcement and advocacy groups who supported the nomination, and administration officials. Expected attendees include: First Lady Michelle Obama  Celina Sotomayor, family of Justice Sotomayor  Omar Lopez, family of Justice Sotomayor  Juan Sotomayor, family of Justice Sotomayor US Supreme Court:  Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg, The US Supreme Court  Justice John Paul Stevens, The US Supreme Court Administration Officials: Gregory Craig, White House Counsel   Lisa Jackson, Administrator,
